AnchoreImage.description: A unique image in the engine. May have multiple tags or references. Unique to an image content across registries or repositories.

analysis_status.description: A state value for the current status of the analysis progress of the image

image_detail.description: Details specific to an image reference and type such as tag and image source

AnchoreImageTagSummary.description: A unique image in the engine.

detail.description: Details structure for additional information about the error if available. Content and structure will be error specific.

ContentResponse.description: Generic wrapper for content listings from images

GateSpec.description: A description of the set of gates available in this engine and the triggers and parameters supported

name.description: Gate name, as it would appear in a policy document

triggers.description: List of the triggers that can fire for this Gate

ImageAnalysisReport.description: Analysis report json to be imported

ImageAnalysisRequest.description: A request to add an image to be watched and analyzed by the engine. Optionally include the dockerfile content. Either digest or tag must be present

annotations.description: Annotations to be associated with the added image in key/value form

digest.description: A full pullable digest reference for an image. e.g. docker.io/nginx@sha256:abc123

dockerfile.description: Content of the dockerfile for the image, if available

image_type.description: The type of image this is adding, defaults to "docker"

tag.description: Full pullable tag reference for image. e.g. docker.io/nginx:latest

ImageContent.description: A metadata content record for a specific image, containing different content type entries

ImageDetail.description: A metadata detail record for a specific image. Multiple detail records may map a single catalog image.

fullDigest.description: Full docker-pullable digest string including the registry url and repository necessary get the image

fulltag.description: Full docker-pullalbe tag string referencing the image

imageDigest.description: The parent Anchore Image record to which this detail maps

ImageFilter.description: Filter for an image list by id, tag, or digest, but not both

PolicyBundle.description: A bundle containing a set of policies, whitelists, and rules for mapping them to specific images

blacklisted_images.description: List of mapping rules that define which images should always result in a STOP/FAIL policy result regardless of policy content or presence in whitelisted_images

comment.description: Description of the bundle, human readable

mappings.description: Mapping rules for defining which policy and whitelist(s) to apply to an image based on a match of the image tag or id. Evaluated in order.

name.description: Human readable name for the bundle

policies.description: Policies which define the go/stop/warn status of an image using rule matches on image properties

version.description: Version id for this bundle format

whitelisted_images.description: List of mapping rules that define which images should always be passed (unless also on the blacklist), regardless of policy result.

whitelists.description: Whitelists which define which policy matches to disregard explicitly in the final policy decision

PolicyBundleRecord.description: A policy bundle plus some metadata

active.description: True if the bundle is currently defined to be used automatically

policy_source.description: Source location of where the policy bundle originated

userId.description: UserId of the user that owns the bundle

PolicyRule.description: A rule that defines and decision value if the match is found true for a given image.

PruneCandidate.description: A resource that can be pruned

PruneCandidateList.description: A list of prune candidate resources

RegistryConfiguration.description: A registry entry describing the endpoint and credentials for a registry to pull images from

registry.description: hostname:port string for accessing the registry, as would be used in a docker pull operation

registry_user.description: Username portion of credential to use for this registry

registry_verify.description: Use TLS/SSL verification for the registry URL

userId.description: Engine user that owns this registry entry

RepositoryTagList.description: List of discovered tags in a repository

base_url.description: The url to reach the service, including port as needed

host_id.description: The unique id of the host on which the service is executing

status_message.description: A state indicating the condition of the service. Normal operation is 'registered'

version.description: The version of the service as reported by the service implementation on registration

subscription_id.description: the unique id for this subscription record

subscription_key.description: The key value that the subscription references. E.g. a tag value or a repo name.

subscription_value.description: The value of the subscription target

userId.description: The userId of the subscribed user

SubscriptionRequest.description: A subscription entry to add to the system

SubscriptionUpdate.description: A modification to a subscription entry to change its status or value

active.description: Toggle the subscription processing on or off

subscription_value.description: The new subscription value, e.g. the new tag to be subscribed to

name.description: Parameter name as it appears in policy document

required.description: Is this a required parameter or optional

validator.description: If present, a definition for validation of input. Typically a jsonschema object that can be used to validate an input against.

TriggerSpec.description: Definition of a trigger and its parameters

description.description: Trigger description for what it tests and when it will fire during evaluation

name.description: Name of the trigger as it would appear in a policy document

parameters.description: The list of parameters that are valid for this trigger

fix.description: The package containing a fix, if available

package.description: The package name and version that are vulnerable in the image

url.description: The url for more information about the vulnerability

vuln.description: The vulnerability identifier, such as CVE-2017-100, or RHSA-2017123

Whitelist.description: A collection of whitelist items to match a policy evaluation against.

WhitelistItem.description: Identifies a specific gate and trigger match from a policy against an image and indicates it should be ignored in final policy decisions

info.description: This is the Anchore Engine API. Provides the primary external API for users of the service.
info.title: Anchore Engine API Server

get.description: List all images visible to the user

parameters.description: Include image history in the response
parameters.name: history

post.description: Creates a new analysis task that is executed asynchronously

parameters.description: Override any existing entry in the system
parameters.name: force

parameters.description: Instruct engine to automatically begin watching the added tag for updates from registry
parameters.name: autosubscribe

200.description: Successfully added image to analysis queue

schema.description: List of AnchoreImage objects, should be of length 1

post.summary: Submit a new image for analysis by the engine

get.description: Get the policy evaluation for the given image
get.summary: Check policy evaluation status for image

200.description: Content of specified type from the image
Content of specified type from the image

get.summary: Get the content of an image by type

get.description: Get the policy evaluation for the given image
get.summary: Check policy evaluation status for image

200.description: Content of specified type from the image

get.summary: Get the content of an image by type

parameters.description: Include policy bundle detail in the form of the full bundle content for each entry
parameters.name: detail

post.description: Adds a new policy bundle to the system

parameters.description: Include policy bundle detail in the form of the full bundle content for each entry
parameters.name: detail

get.description: List all configured registries the system can/will watch

post.description: Adds a new registry to the system

delete.description: Delete a registry configuration record from the system. Does not remove any images.

get.description: Get information on a specific registry

put.description: Replaces an existing registry record with the given record

parameters.description: full repository to add e.g. docker.io/library/alpine
parameters.name: repository

parameters.description: flag to enable/disable auto tag_update activation when new images from a repo are added
parameters.name: autosubscribe

parameters.description: use specified existing tag to perform repo scan (default is 'latest')
parameters.name: lookuptag

post.description: Create a new subscription to watch a tag and get notifications of changes
post.summary: Add a subscription of a specific type

delete.summary: Delete subscriptions of a specific type

put.summary: Update an existing and specific subscription

get.description: List all image tags visible to the user
get.summary: List all visible image digests and tags

get.description: Get the system status including queue lengths
Get the policy language spec for this service
get.summary: Describe the policy language spec implemented by this service.
Get list of resources that can be pruned

parameters.description: filter only resources older than specified number of seconds
parameters.name: olderthan

get.summary: Get list of candidates for pruning

post.summary: Perform pruning on input resource name

get.summary: Get a service configuration and state
Get service config for a specific host
